title: Understanding Signal Processing Basics
excerpt: A quick introduction to the fundamental concepts of signal processing for engineers and enthusiasts.
author: Jane Doe
content:
Introduction

Signal processing is a field of engineering that focuses on the analysis, manipulation, and interpretation of signals. Signals can be audio, video, sensor data, and more.

Key Concepts

  • Sampling
  • Filtering
  • Fourier Transform

Applications

Signal processing is used in audio engineering, telecommunications, medical imaging, and many other domains.
